description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in NBD80S09S-KLC v.YK_HZXM_NBD80S09S-KLC_V4.03.R11.7601.Nat.OnvifC.20230414.bin and NBD80N32RA-KL-V3 v.YK_HZXM_NBD80N32RA-KL_V4.03.R11.7601.Nat.OnvifC.20220120.bin allows a remote attacker to casue a denial of service via a crafted request to the service.XM component.
